Component Library ðŸ“¦

TailPySCSS v0.5 includes a comprehensive suite of 30+ components. These are Python classes that generate Semantic HTML and trigger the optimized CSS engine.

Note: All components are available via from tailpyscss.ui import ...

Base & Layout

The core building blocks of any interface.

Card

A flexible container with shadow, padding, and rounded corners.

Card(
    children=[
        "This is card content",
        Button("Click Me")
    ]
)

Button

Standard interactive button.

Button("Submit", type="submit")

Badge

Small status indicator.

Badge("New")

Alert

Contextual feedback message.

Alert("Payment Successful!")

Navbar

Top navigation header.

Navbar(
   Link("Home"), Link("About")
)

Forms

Input data with style. Vibe-aware borders and focus states.

Input

Input(placeholder="email@example.com")

Textarea

Textarea(placeholder="Enter your message...")

Switch

Toggle switch (prettier checkbox).

Switch(label="Enable Dark Mode")

Select

Select(
    Option("Option 1"),
    Option("Option 2")
)

Navigation

Getting around your application.

Tabs

Tabs("Profile", "Settings", "Billing")

Sidebar

Sidebar(Link("Dashboard"), Link("Users"))

Breadcrumb

Breadcrumb("Home", "Products", "Details")

Feedback & Overlay

Modal

Dialog overlay with backdrop.

Modal(
    "Are you sure?",
    Button("Yes"), Button("No")
)

Toast

Non-blocking notification popup.

Toast("Changes saved")

Spinner

Loading animation.

Spinner()
